snippet: The South African Paralympic and Olympic track star Oscar Pistorius was indicted Monday on a charge of premeditated murder in the death of his girlfriend.
abstract: Oscar Pistorious, double amputee international track star, is indicted in a South African court on a charge of premeditated murder in the shooting death of his girlfriend Reeva Steenkamp.

byline.original: By LYDIA POLGREEN and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Lydia Polgreen reported from Johannesburg, and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: The South African Paralympic and Olympic track star Oscar Pistorius was indicted Monday on a charge of premeditated murder in the death of his girlfriend.

headline.main: Pistorius Is Indicted on Murder Charge
headline.print_headline: Pistorius Is Indicted on a Charge of Murder
